mema siddhiya sambandhayen nothisi matha adhikaranaye peni siti chudithayan dedena rupiyal haththa pandahasaka mudal saha rupiyal laksha 10 bagin wu sharira apa deka bagin matha muda harimata adhikaranaya ikuth agosthu masa 21 wanida piyawara gaththe ya. 2011 wasare agosthu masa 10 dina sita 2012 wasare desambar masa 31 wanida dakwa wu kala parichchedaya thuladi rajaye sewakayan wu enam siwil guwansewa amathyawaraya wu palamu chuditha saha siwil guwan sewa amathyawarayage paudgalika lekam lesa sewaye yedi siti dewani chuditha ayuthu sahagatha lesa ho nithiwirodhi lesa swakiya dhuraya kelinma ho anyakarayen bhawitha karamin allas panathe 70 wani waganthiya prakakarawa mema “dushanaya” nam warada sidukara athayi allas komisama chodana 05k yatathe chudithayanta erehiwa chodana nanga thibe.

me anuwa apata ithama pahadiliwa peni yanne rajapaksha rejimaya balaya hebawu samaye rajapaksha pawula wethin rajya sampath itha anisi lesa thama sukhawiharanaya sandaha yoda gath kalliya eewata kruthaguna salakimata sema yali ema sukhawiharana laba ganime thrushnawen gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha yali osawa thabima sandaha aprahitha dhairyakin, prathipaththi wirahitha awanathabhawayakin kriyathmaka wana bawayi.
me thulin oba dena paniwidayayi itha wadagath wisiri, hamadamath oba mewan de liya sanwedi manushyathwayata upahara pudanawa.
wadagathma deya nam "kanata dimata" pera, "katata (saha badata) di sitiya yuthu bawa" ada inna sucharithawadinta wada hondata budunta theri thibimayi.
